title: Bachelor of Business Administration in Management
description: A degree in Business Management will empower you to achieve business objectives, start your own business, and be a leader. You can even specialize your degree to define your personal career goals. Foundational to your degree, you’ll study the management of organizations, people, and projects along with courses in operations management, entrepreneurship, international business, human resource management, and family business.
school: Michael A. Leven School of Management, Entrepreneurship, and Hospitality
